sent.orig: The project will help the company expand in rural markets, expand product sales in rural areas.
sent.trans: 此次项目的实施将有利于公司拓展农村市场，扩大公司产品在农村地区的销售。

sent.orig: Universes might expand, then shrink back to a point, then expand again.
sent.trans: 宇宙可能会膨胀，然后再收缩至某一点，然后再度膨胀。

sent.orig: To expand the class shape, on the Class Diagram menu, click Expand.
sent.trans: 若要展开类形状，请在“类关系图”菜单上单击“展开”。

sent.orig: Expand a membership, expand team, the society that promotes association is degree reach its to affect.
sent.trans: 发展会员，壮大队伍，提升协会的社会知名度及其影响。

sent.orig: In the course of development, gradually expand their own and development capabilities and and development institutions.
sent.trans: 公司在发展过程中，逐步壮大自身的研发能力和研发机构。
